  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:fnbe.profium.com:http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/showfile.php?id=165&file=165_pohjan-rikkominen.jpg</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>fnbe</catalog>
            <entry>http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/showfile.php?id=165&file=165_pohjan-rikkominen.jpg</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fi">Pohjan rikkominen</string>
            <string language="en">Breaking the base</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechen der Unterseite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rupture de la base</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quebrando a base</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rompere la base</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σπάσιμο της βάσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Romper la base</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään, miten savesta voidaan koota halutunlainen kokonaisuus rikkomalla pohjakappale ja levittämällä siihen slippiä.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows how clay can be assembled into a desired whole by breaking the base-piece and spreading  slip (liquid clay) into the same.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clay</string>
            <string language="en">base-piece</string>
            <string language="en">breaking</string>
            <string language="en">liquid</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityö</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityökasvatus</string>
            <string language="fi">makkaratekniikka</string>
            <string language="fi">käsinrakennusmenetelmät,</string>
            <string language="fi">savi</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung zeigt, wie Lehm in ein gewünschtes 
vollständiges zusammengebaut werden kann, indem man das 
Unterseite-Stück bricht und Beleg (flüssigen Lehm) in dasselbe 
verbreitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma montre comment de l'argile peut être 
assemblé dans un entier désiré en cassant le base-morceau et en 
écartant la glissade (argile liquide) dans la même chose.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho mostra como a argila pode ser montada em
um inteiro desejado quebrando a base-parte e espalhando o deslizamento
(argila líquida) no mesmo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra come l'argilla può essere 
montata in un intero voluto rompendo la base-parte e spargendo lo 
slittamento (argilla liquida) nello stesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο επιδεικνύει πώς ο άργιλος μπορεί να 
συγκεντρωθεί σε ένα επιθυμητό σύνολο με το σπάσιμο του 
βάση-κομματιού και τη διάδοση της ολίσθησης (υγρός άργιλος) στο 
ίδιο πράγμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra cómo la arcilla se puede 
ensamblar en un entero deseada rompiendo el base-pedazo y separando el
resbalón (arcilla líquida) en igual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterseite-Stück</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüssigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">argile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">base-morceau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rupture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">liquide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">argila</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">base-parte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quebrar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">líquido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">argilla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">base-parte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rompersi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">liquido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άργιλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βάση-κομμάτι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">base-pedazo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el romperse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">líquido</string>
          </keyword>
